body:
Yes, what Aram said. I'll open a ticket to the th machine rebooted.

For context this kernel leaks unkillble test/64bit processes.

On Sat, 4 Apr 2015 23:52 Aram Hăvărneanu <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> The machine uses a buggy kernel. The remedy is to upgrade the kernel.
> Because we don't really "own" the machine, we can't do that.
>
> The real solution is to have builder 100% dedicated to the Go project that
> we can administer as we like.
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/10346#issuecomment-89568421>.
>
